summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 VOLKSWAGEN ROUTAN. WHILE DRIVING AT AN UNKNOWN SPEED, THE VEHICLE STALLED IN THE MIDDLE OF THE STREET. THE CONTACT COULD NOT GUIDE THE VEHICLE TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD AND HAD TO ACTIVATE THE HAZARD LIGHTS. THE CONTACT WAS ABLE TO RESTART THE VEHICLE AND DRIVE HOME AFTER WAITING FIFTEEN MINUTES. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WHO DIAGNOSED THAT THE FUEL PUMP RELAY FAILED. THE CONTACT SPOKE WITH AN UNKNOWN VOLKSWAGEN DEALER AND WAS INFORMED THAT THERE WERE NO RECALLS FOR THE FAILURE AND THIS MODEL VEHICLE WAS CURRENTLY MADE FROM CHRYSLER. THE CONTACT WAS WAITING TO HEAR BACK FROM THE INDEPENDENT MECHANIC. THE MANUFACTURER HAD NOT BEEN CONTACTED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 30,000.
